definition: "the Far West"/old term for Europe and America
Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
Great European Scholar (honorific title of Matteo Ricci)

sentences.english: Sarah and Tom arrived this morning with little Tessie .
sentences.chinese: 今早莎拉和汤姆带着小泰西也赶到了。

sentences.english: Teissier says Marseille has all it takes to be a leader in the Mediterranean region.
sentences.chinese: 泰西耶说，马赛具备成为地中海地区领袖的一切条件。

sentences.english: The rumour is that he and Stacie were once involved.
sentences.chinese: 传言他和斯泰西曾一度交往过。

sentences.english: Thought we were going to have to get on without you, Tessie .
sentences.chinese: 还以为我们接下去摸彩要不带你了呢，泰西。

sentences.english: The area's homes and stores get heat from the Vertesi power plant.
sentences.chinese: 因为威尔泰西发电厂，该区的房子和商店变得火热。

definition: Western learning (intellectual movement in the late Qing)/also called 洋務運動|洋务运动
the West (Europe and North America)/countries of the Indian Ocean (traditional)
foreign religion (esp. Western Christianity in Qing China)
non-Han tribes in the east and north of ancient China/barbarians
